description.value: Information required in Norwegian e-resept (electronic prescription).

definition.value: Ifnormation that is relevant for Norwegian e-prescription.

short.value: Last date the pharmacy can deliver

definition.value: Boolean that identify if the patient is a soldier.
Request to Helfo for medication cost refund
Registration that the patient get all expences refunded by the gouverment.
boolean that states that the patients guardian should not have access to the resept.

short.value: Identify that the medication is for use in own organisation

definition.value: mechansims to keep the patient name secret to the pharmacy.
Used when the resept is locked or when patient do not have norwegian legal identity.
Request to a single pharmacy to prepare (or send) the medication to the patient.
The first date the doctor want the pharmacy to deliver the medication to the patient.
Identify what type of resept it is. Medication, Nutrition support etc.
identifies the number of tablets or amount of liquid that should be delivered to the patient for each REIT.

short.value: Identifies if in RF and status in RF

definition.value: Textual information that prescriber has provided for the pharmacy, in order to support the dispence.
Information provided from RF. Summary of what has been dispenced on the prescription (resept).
Instruction from EPJ to SFM regarding what should be done about prescription (resept).
